name: Yun Jin
title: Stage Lucida
description: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

cv.japanese: 小岩井ことり & Yang Yang

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cloud-Grazing Strike
skills.description: Normal AttackPerforms up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.Charged AttackConsumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.Plunging AttackPlunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Opening Flourish
skills.description: Ms. Yun may just be acting out fights on stage, but her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes.PressFlourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG.HoldTakes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG. The shield lasts until she finishes unleashing her Elemental Skill.When the skill is released, when its duration ends, or when the shield breaks, Yun Jin will unleash the charged energy as an attack, dealing Geo DMG.Based on the time spent charging, it will either unleash an attack at Charge Level 1 or Level 2.
skills.info: One glorious moment on-stage, a decade of preparation behind it.

skills.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
skills.description: Deals AoE Geo DMG and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation.Flying Cloud Flag FormationWhen Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF.The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times.When one Normal Attack hits multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times according to the number of opponents hit. The number of times that the effect is triggered is counted independently for each member of the party with Flying Cloud Flag Formation.
skills.info: As the drums resound, as swords and halberds weave and clash, the doyenne is transformed into a mighty general.As the instruments on stage strum in unison, lo, see how she vanquishes these demons!

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cloud-Grazing Strike
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Opening Flourish
skills.description: Ms. Yun may just be acting out fights on stage, but her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes. Press Flourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG. Hold Takes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG. The shield lasts until she finishes unleashing her Elemental Skill. When the skill is released, when its duration ends, or when the shield breaks, Yun Jin will unleash the charged energy as an attack, dealing Geo DMG. Based on the time spent charging, it will either unleash an attack at Charge Level 1 or Level 2.
skills.info: One glorious moment on-stage, a decade of preparation behind it.

skills.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
skills.description: Deals AoE Geo DMG and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation. Flying Cloud Flag Formation When Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF. The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times. When one Normal Attack hits multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times according to the number of opponents hit. The number of times that the effect is triggered is counted independently for each member of the party with Flying Cloud Flag Formation.
skills.info:
As the drums resound, as swords and halberds weave and clash, the doyenne is transformed into a mighty general.
As the instruments on stage strum in unison, lo, see how she vanquishes these demons!

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cloud-Grazing Strike
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Opening Flourish
skills.description: Ms. Yun may just be acting out fights on stage, but her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes. Press Flourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG. Hold Takes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG. The shield lasts until she finishes unleashing her Elemental Skill. When the skill is released, when its duration ends, or when the shield breaks, Yun Jin will unleash the charged energy as an attack, dealing Geo DMG. Based on the time spent charging, it will either unleash an attack at Charge Level 1 or Level 2.
skills.info: One glorious moment on-stage, a decade of preparation behind it.

skills.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
skills.description: Deals AoE Geo DMG and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation. Flying Cloud Flag Formation When Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF. The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times. When one Normal Attack hits multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times according to the number of opponents hit. The number of times that the effect is triggered is counted independently for each member of the party with Flying Cloud Flag Formation.
skills.info:
As the drums resound, as swords and halberds weave and clash, the doyenne is transformed into a mighty general.
As the instruments on stage strum in unison, lo, see how she vanquishes these demons!

passives.name: True to Oneself
passives.description: Using Opening Flourish at the precise moment when Yun Jin is attacked will unleash its Level 2 Charged (Hold) form.

passives.name: Breaking Conventions
passives.description: The Normal Attack DMG Bonus granted by Flying Cloud Flag Formation is further increased by 2.5%/5%/7.5%/11.5% of Yun Jin's DEF when the party contains characters of 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, respectively.

passives.name: Light Nourishment
passives.description: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Thespian Gallop
constellations.description: Opening Flourish's CD is decreased by 18%.

constellations.name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène
constellations.description: After Cliffbreaker's Banner is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Seafaring General
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Cliffbreaker's Banner by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flower and a Fighter
constellations.description: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

constellations.name: Famed Throughout the Land
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Opening Flourish by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Decorous Harmony
constellations.description: Characters under the effects of the Flying Cloud Flag Formation have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

outfits.name: Mistcloud Stage
outfits.description: Yun Jin's outfit. It was made by skilled tailors from the Feiyun Commerce Guild. Yun Jin fell in love with it at first sight, and it is now her favorite set of casual wear.
